title: ITGlue Integration and Local Cache
details: Added support for scanning IP ranges using linked ITGlue organizations.
Introduced local cache for ITGlue organizations to improve performance.
Cronjob guidance added for scheduled ITGlue sync.
Improved match suggestions using first 3 letters of customer name.

title: 2FA and User Profile Enhancements
details: 2FA toggle added per user with QR code setup modal.
New user profile page with language selection and password change.
Volt-style dark mode layout for user profile and login.
Session timeout option added to security settings.

title: Settings and Internal Login System
details: Settings panel split into General, Security, Users, Backup.
Internal user database implemented with hashed passwords and PEPPER.
Login text can now be customized from settings.
Office365 login support with group-based access control.

title: Initial Version
details: Base IPAM layout with sidebar navigation and dynamic content.
Support for customers, IP ranges and inline IP editing.
Volt Dashboard theme with live statistics and footer bar.
Basic login with admin/admin (for development only).
